Class MinecraftDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.to2mbn.jmccc.option.MinecraftDirectory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MinecraftDirectory
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Describes a minecraft directory.
    Author:
    yushijinhun
